title: RIO
description: A user-friendly rental platform where individuals can post and browse rental listings, complete with features like user roles, secure authentication, and seamless navigation for an effortless renting experience.

title: Cloud Kitchen Web
description: A dynamic cloud kitchen platform enabling users to browse menus, place orders, and track them, offering a seamless and interactive food ordering experience.

title: NYC Fair estimation model
description: A web-based system designed to predict NYC cab fares with precision leveraging historical data, geographic details, and trip attributes to deliver accurate fare estimates.

title: React Firebase Auth and Roles
description: A boilerplate web application implementing role-based access control. The project defines various user roles with granular access control, including admin and owner roles. It demonstrates secure user authentication and role-based authorization strategies.

title: Opacha-MDA Multiplayer
description: A Windows recreation of a mobile multiplayer game using React, HTML, CSS, and HTML Canvas for rendering the game arena.

title: BlogBook
description: A full-stack blogging application enabling users to create, search, and manage blogs. Features include admin role for blog deletion and a Python Flask backend for database operations.

title: DBHandlerLite
description: An Android application developed using Java and Android Studio for performing CRUD operations on a MySQL database directly from an Android device.
